element.name: Button
element.description: RWT Buttons, including push-buttons, toggle-buttons, radio-buttons and check-boxes.

style.name: PUSH
style.description: Indicates that the button is a push button.

style.name: TOGGLE
style.description: Indicates that the button is a toggle button.

style.name: CHECK
style.description: Indicates that the button is a check box.

style.name: RADIO
style.description: Indicates that the button is a radio button.

style.name: FLAT
style.description: Indicates that the button should have a flat appearance.

style.name: BORDER
style.description: Indicates that the button should have a border.

state.name: hover
state.description: Applies while the user hovers over a button.

state.name: pressed
state.description: Applies while a button is pressed.

state.name: selected
state.description: Applies for selected TOGGLE, CHECK and RADIO buttons.

color.name: button.foreground
color.description: Text color for PUSH and TOGGLE buttons

color.name: button.hover.foreground
color.description: Text color for PUSH and TOGGLE buttons on mouse over

color.name: button.CHECK.foreground
color.description: Text color for with style CHECK and RADIO

color.name: button.background
color.description: Background color for PUSH and TOGGLE buttons

color.name: button.CHECK.background
color.description: Background color for buttons with style CHECK and RADIO

color.name: button.hover.background
color.description: Background color for PUSH and TOGGLE buttons on mouse over

color.name: button.FLAT.pressed.background
color.description: Background color for selected toggle buttons with FLAT style

color.name: button.FLAT.pressed.foreground
color.description: Foreground color for selected toggle buttons with FLAT style

border.name: button.border
border.description: Border for (PUSH and TOGGLE) buttons without BORDER and FLAT style

border.name: button.pressed.border
border.description: Border for pressed (PUSH and TOGGLE) buttons without BORDER and FLAT style

border.name: button.FLAT.border
border.description: Border for (PUSH and TOGGLE) buttons with FLAT style

border.name: button.FLAT.pressed.border
border.description: Border for pressed (PUSH and TOGGLE) buttons with FLAT style

border.name: button.BORDER.border
border.description: Border for (PUSH and TOGGLE) buttons with BORDER style

border.name: button.BORDER.pressed.border
border.description: Border for pressed (PUSH and TOGGLE) buttons with BORDER style

font.name: button.font
font.description: Font for buttons with style PUSH or TOGGLE
font.default: 11 'Segoe UI', Corbel, Calibri, Tahoma, 'Lucida Sans Unicode', sans-serif
